name: Go to Mama (Friendly Fire)
description:
An adorable game about a baby who has just learned to walk. Spend time with your mother and father, who love each other very much! Go to mama or go to papa when asked to, just don't leave them waiting for too long! The perfect game about a perfect family which includes 12 endings. WOW! That's a lot of family fun right there! 


CONTROLS: 
Arrow Keys: Move
Space: Restart game after an ending
Escape: ???

Credits:
Art, Design, Programming, Writing: Rami Shreim.
Back-Seat Writer: Duncan Sparks.
Music borrowed from Dorian Cromartie.
